CustomField.description: The date and time a prospect last interacted with your Pardot marketing assets. The field updates when a prospect performs activities such as page visits, form submissions, link clicks, and file downloads. Any prospect activity except for an email open updates the Last Activity field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The date and time a prospect last interacted with your Pardot marketing assets. The field updates when a prospect performs activities such as page visits, form submissions, link clicks, and file downloads. Any prospect activity except for an email open updates the Last Activity field.
CustomField.label: Pardot Last Activity
